about_the_game:
BUILD. DEFEND. CONQUER.

Step onto a sunlit beach where imagination meets strategy in Defenders of the Dune! In this real-time strategy game, players take control of a sandcastle kingdom, constructing buildings, training units, and preparing defenses against waves of enemies.

The game revolves around a dynamic day-night cycle that keeps you on your toes. Use the day to gather resources, build fortifications, and expand your territory. But beware, As night falls, brace yourself for attacks from swarming ant armies and other adversaries threatening your sandcastle empire.

Features include:

  • Base Building: Construct and upgrade structures to create a thriving sandcastle civilization.

  • Unit Management: Train specialized units to defend your kingdom and launch attacks on enemy burrows.

  • Customizable Strategies: Unlock and experiment with unique buildings, equipment, and units to perfect your strategy.

  • Dynamic Threats: Face off against challenging enemies and contend with building decay outside your base’s range.

  • Final Wave Challenge: Face the ultimate test of your sandcastle empire in a climactic showdown with an overwhelming ant army.

Whether you’re a seasoned RTS fan or a newcomer to the genre, Defenders of the Dune offers a charming yet deeply tactical experience. Can you withstand the tide and claim victory, or will your efforts wash away with the waves?

short_description: Defenders of the Dune is a game about overcoming the wilderness and establishing a kingdom in defiance of the land itself. Players will fight to survive each day, experiencing the challenge and pride that comes with building up their base against all odds
